item.description:
Kimball Farm hosts Cruise Night, with as many as 350 cars ranging from Corvettes to Model A's. The now famous "Ultimate Cruise Night" in Westford offers the additional excitement of live local band entertainment and our delicious Kimball Farm BBQ grill.

Try to resist our Legendary Ice Cream Buffet. What better way is there to spend a Summer evening. Admission for the general public is $3.00* for adults and children under 12 are free. Car exhibitors & their passengers enter at no charge. So dust off the fuzzy dice and come on down to Cruise Night at Kimball Farm...Bring the whole family!

Touring membership not required to attend this event

*Show off your Fuzzy Dice on your scooter and Twisted Touring will pay your admission!
item.name: Cruise Night at Kimball's
